author: litra
description: Azure DevOps Example with hot reload

scripts.build-release: webpack --mode production && tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --overrides-file vss-extension-release.json --output-path out --rev-version
scripts.build-debug: webpack --mode development && tfx extension create --manifest-globs vss-extension.json --overrides-file vss-extension-dev.json --output-path out --rev-version && webpack-dev-server --mode development
